snippet: A Mercedes project to develop what it calls the predictive user experience will observe how drivers and passengers use a car to anticipate their wants.
abstract: Mercedes-Benz is developing a project it calls predictive user experience that will observe and analyze drivers and passengers to determine what they want most from their vehicles; preferences can then be transferred to other vehicles by automaker, adding reason for customers to stay loyal to Mercedes brand.
lead_paragraph: A Mercedes project to develop what it calls the predictive user experience will observe how drivers and passengers use a car to anticipate their wants.

headline.main: Sensors Could Put Cars a Step Ahead of Their Drivers
headline.print_headline: Sensors Could Put Cars a Step Ahead of Their Drivers
